an3.114:1.1: “Mendicants, the appearance of three people is rare in the world.
an3.114:1.3: A Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha. A person who teaches the teaching and training proclaimed by a Realized One. A person who is grateful and thankful.
an3.114:1.4: The appearance of these three people is rare in the world.”
